original_text: Behold, I will bring to it health and healing, and I will heal them and reveal to them abundance of prosperity and security.
korean_text: 그러나 보라 내가 이 성읍을 치료하며 고쳐 낫게 하고 평안과 진실이 풍성함을 그들에게 나타낼 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will bring to it health and healing,
and reveal to them abundance of prosperity and security.
